techonologyPageMeta.quote: A powerful distributed network of conversations

linkUrl.title: Discover OpenWeb’s moderation and safety framework

content.heading: Quality driven technology
content.description: By employing unique tools that encourage positive user contribution and create a healthy online environment, we help publishers to treat the cause, not the symptoms.
content.list:
• Quality Score: Quantifying quality based on reading time, approval rate, and safety score.
  • Reputational Score: A unified scoring system to assess the value of a user’s contribution to the community.
  • Community Moderation: A reliable and scalable crowd-sourced moderation solution, offering top users a stake in the community’s overall well-being.
  • Moderation tools: Built on machine-learning, AI, trusted API integrations, and human moderation to nurture a safe environment that help communities thrive.

content.heading: Smooth and seamless integration
content.description: OpenWeb is the only conversation platform that integrates across all devices and environments and can be easily implemented on a variety of publisher-user touchpoints — giving users a fluent and engaging experience.
content.list:
• Cross-device coverage – desktop, mobile and tablet
  • Native in-app SDK – iOS and android
  • Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP)

content.heading: Built for performance
content.description: OpenWeb’s robust infrastructure allows for scale and speed that supports billions of quality conversations in real-time.
content.list:
• Our tech has ‘zero impact’ on page and site load time.
  • Elastic technology using Golang, React, Kubernetes, and more, auto-scales to withstand spikes in volume.
  • Agile Support for rich media, videos, images, gifs, and tweets.

content.heading: Powerhouse of first-party data
content.description: Our tech provides unique insights that help you grow your bottom line, all the while upholding values of transparency and user privacy in a cookie-less world.
content.list:
• Granular user-level data for over 100 million monthly active users.
  • Robust DMP architecture that provides easy data transfers, key audience insights, and targeting.
  • Support for custom data enrichment plans through API integrations.
